name: Color Pixel Art - Atti Land 2
description:
Sue was having the same old day just like yesterday, and a cat stole her watch.
She happened to find a ladder, when she came after a cat trying to find her watch. to find a ladder, when she came after a cat trying to find her watch.
Curious enough, Sue climbed a ladder, and met a cat on the ladder.
Upon the ladder, there was a grey island, floating in the sky.

Help to find the island’s stars and bring beautiful colors to the island.
There are a variety of stories and cute pictures waiting for you.
Take a big rest in the second Atti Land and release your anxiety.
When you finish each pictures, you will meet cute little animals and find your own little happiness.

Main Features
- Anyone can enjoy painting pictures, all ages.
- You can enjoy little stories by cute animals like a fairy tale.
- Step by step, you can enjoy the island’s features getting back the lost star lights.
- You can download and keep the finished pictures.
- You can paint multiple cells that are close to each other and have the same numbers by using paint.
- By using hints you can easily find the numbers.
- You can enjoy this game by customizing and choosing how to paint the colors.

We hope you have wonderful and happy time in Atti Land.

[Guidance on Permissions]
Attiland 2 requires the following permissions.

[Optional access rights]
Storage - When saving an image after completing a puzzle, read and write access to the storage space is required. puzzle completion.
